item.title: Fendi names Maria Grazia Chiuri as creative director of Italian fashion house
item.description: Fendi has named Maria Grazia Chiuri as its new creative director after Silvia Venturini Fendi stepped aside to become honorary president

item.title: China's exports of electric vehicles doubled in September
item.description: China has reported that its electric vehicle exports doubled in September from a year earlier as its automakers expanded further into overseas markets

item.title: Greece sees 2nd general strike this month as unions protest new labor law
item.description: Thousands of demonstrators have marched through Athens as labor unions call Greece's second general strike this month

item.title: Russian aerial attack hits a Ukrainian hospital, days before Zelenskyy meets Trump
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says Russian forces have launched powerful glide bombs and drones against Kharkiv and hit a hospital

item.title: Asian shares are mixed and US futures little changed after Wall St rally
item.description: Asian shares are mixed after a rally on Wall Street spurred by U.S. President Donald Trump's reassurances over relations with China
